version_description:
- Looking for a new challenge? You've got it! Get involved in a brand new episode featuring 24 regular levels and a further 24 evil levels
- Show those monsters who's boss with 2 new super weapons: an RPG and blob-thrower
- Put your monster destroying skills to use as you battle 5 new enemies: Miss Clean, Mutant Cow, Firefly, Blob Bob and The Dragon Boss

NEW EPISODE: Ready for some high-octane fun? Play 24 new regular and 24 new evil levels!
NEW MONSTERS: These monsters are mean, scary, and armed to the teeth! Get ready to fight evil possums, skunks, otters and raccoons!
NEW WEAPONS: You’re gonna need bigger, better weapons to fight the monsters so we’ve got you covered!
NEW LANGUAGES: Now you can play the game in Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, and Korean!

NEW EPISODE: Bringing you 24 regular levels and 24 evil levels so you can obliterate those evil critters to your heart’s content.
NEW MONSTERS: Things just got a bit harder, thanks to evil robots that protect other monsters, heal them and increase their power. Are you up for the challenge?
NEW POWERFUL WEAPON: Vicious swarm of bees!
NEW DEFENSE ITEM: Being a good guy has paid off - now you have a helping hand from your neighbor.
IMPROVEMENTS: We’ve made the game even better with bug fixes and improvements.

NEW EPISODE: 24 new regular levels and 24 new evil levels for more quality time with monsters.
NEW MONSTERS: Evil Blaster Gun, the strongest laser the Swamp has ever seen, and a vicious mechanical boss. Can you handle them both?
NEW POWERFUL WEAPON: Full-size concert piano. Express yourself in style.
NEW DEFENSE ITEM: New visitor – friendly but ferocious Russian bear. Good thing he's on your side.
FILL ENERGY: Quick and easy way to fill energy on the fly by watching a video ad.

MULTIPLAYER MODE!!!
You are not alone in the Swamp anymore! Play with people all around the world – send them monsters and defend your house against the ones they send you! Shoot at the birds to get monster eggs and use the cannon to shoot the eggs at other players! You choose which monsters to send and when. Can you handle that much power? Personalize your profile with your name and Facebook picture!

FACEBOOK INVITE AWARDS
Invite Facebook friends and get extra battery slots when they log in.

The latest Swamp Attack update is here! Get it now for the following features:
A new power-up system! You can now use a power-up to dramatically increase your shotgun reloading speed and eliminate monsters faster.
Rebalanced and optimized weapons and levels.
Bug fixes and improvements.

A new power-up system! You can now use a power-up to dramatically increase your shotgun reloading speed and eliminate monsters faster.
Rebalanced and optimized weapons and levels.
Bug fixes and improvements.

The latest Swamp Attack update is here! Get it now for the following features:
A new power-up system! You can now use a power-up to dramatically increase your shotgun reloading speed and eliminate monsters faster.
Rebalanced and optimized weapons and levels.
Bug fixes and improvements.

New levels: Master your skills and earn some more coins and weapons in Challenge mode. New Challenge levels make you test and perfect all your strategic Swamp Attack skills.
New Weapon: Scarecrow - scares monsters. They run away from you and your house, scared to death.
New monsters: Pigs, pig helms and endless splitter.
Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.

New levels: Master your skills and earn some more coins and weapons in Challenge mode. New Challenge levels make you test and perfect all your strategic Swamp Attack skills.
New Weapon: Scarecrow - scares monsters. They run away from you and your house, scared to death.
New monsters: Pigs, pig helms and endless splitter.
Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.

- Discover 20 new levels in Challenge mode, have more fun, and win even more coins!
- Face the new Piglet Rope and try to defeat the mighty Pig Boss in Challenge mode.
- Dominate your enemies with the Pig Roll, a new weapon that both pushes away and damages monsters at the same time.
- Enjoy the new holiday features.
- Make the most of the improved and more robust Cloud Load/Save features.
- Play even better, thanks to bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

- Warm up your weapons - with two fresh campaign episodes and 48 brand new levels.
- Fearlessly face new enemies and weapons of house destruction.
- Call Uncle Joe to teach you how to handle crazy construction equipment.

24 new challenge levels to up your skills.
Migrated to a completely new engine - should be much faster now, especially on older devices.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
